condition.narrative: The approval of reports is required annuals

title.narrative: Networks for exchange / Growth of people and organisations / Alternative Narratives

description.narrative: Network Partnership Grants are selected based on an annual Call for Proposals and active scouting by the Fund in order to identify relevant cultural initiatives doing ground-breaking work in the field of culture and development. The purpose of the Network Partnership Grant is to enable pioneering work and to secure longevity of excellent institutions in the working remit of the Fund. Network Partners receive support for a new initiative for 3 years and take part in 1-2 meetings a year with other partner organisations to exchange experiences and discuss issues that they find relevant. After three years of financial support, a Network Partner organisation remains part of this international, multi-disciplinary committee as an adviser, attending meetings and contributing to the ongoing cultural exchange.

title.narrative: Excellent new Network Partners are selected that address critical issues and become part of the Prince Claus Fund Network Partners Committee.
